apolloH1.name: Apollo H1
apolloH1.shortDescription: Apollo H1 – শক্তিশালী গ্রিপ, দীর্ঘস্থায়ী পারফরম্যান্স। শহর থেকে হাইওয়ে—সব রাস্তায় দেবে নিরাপদ ও স্মুথ রাইড। কম পরিধান, বেশি কনফিডেন্স।
apolloH1.companyDetails:
Apollo Tyres Ltd is an international tyre manufacturer and the leading tyre brand in India. It is built around the core principles of creating stakeholder value through reliability in its products and dependability in its relationships. The company has a total of seven manufacturing units -- 5 in India and 1 each in the Netherlands and Hungary.

The company markets its products under its two global brands – ****Apollo**** and ****Vredestein****, and its products are available in over 100 countries through a vast network of branded, exclusive and multi-product outlets. The product portfolio of the company includes the entire range of passenger car, SUV, MUV, light truck, truck-bus, two-wheeler, agriculture, industrial, specialty, bicycle and off-the-road tyres, and retreading material and tyres.

Headquartered in Gurgaon, India, the company has a turnover of ****US$ 2.3 billion**** and ranks among the global top 20 tyre makers. Apollo Tyres has been recognised as the ‘Best Company To Work For’ both in Asia and Europe in the recent past, and has won several accolades for its HIV-AIDS awareness and prevention initiative for the trucking and allied communities, and for its Waste Management initiatives in the community.

****Acquired entities****: In November 2015, Apollo Tyres acquired ****Reifencom GmbH****, one of the largest tyre distributors in Germany, with both online and offline presence. In May 2009, the company acquired ****Apollo Vredestein BV****(originally Vredestein Banden BV) in the Netherlands, producer of niche high end passenger car and specialty tyres, and with an extensive distribution network across Europe.

apolloS1.name: Apollo S1
apolloS1.description:
**Features:**

*   Strong grip for all road conditions
    
*   High-speed stability and control
    
*   Long-lasting durability
    
*   Smooth and confident ride
apolloS1.shortDescription: Apollo Alpha S1 – এটি রেডিয়াল টায়ার,  স্ট্রং গ্রিপ, হাই স্ট্যাবিলিটি আর লং লাস্টিং, বেস্ট পারফরম্যান্স এর জন্য সেরা বাইক টায়ার

cstCMDR.name: CST CM-DR
cstCMDR.shortDescription: CST CM-DR টায়ারটি লং লাস্টিং, গ্রিপিং, কর্নারিং, রাইডিং কম্ফোর্টনেস এন্ড ব্রেকিং এর জন্য সেরা একটি টায়ার।
cstCMDR.companyDetails:
CST brand tires are offered by Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co. Ltd. (Cheng Shin Tire). Since the year 1996, SWAN International has been collaborating with Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co. Ltd and helped the company to get the global outreach. By now, SWAN International has turned out as one of the leading tire importers in Bangladesh.

Distributed in more than 150 countries, the CST brand covers a wide range of market segments. CST products include tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, all-terrain vehicles, autos, trucks, forklifts, agricultural and lawn and garden equipment.

With facilities including three factories in Xiamen, China, CST’s operations boast world-class manufacturing equipment, innovative technology and a strong emphasis on quality, delivery and customer satisfaction. CST adheres to the most stringent international standards. The company has attained certificates and awards including DOT (US Department of Transportation) certification, ISO9001, E-Mark, TS 16949 and the China Well Known Brand Award.

Utilizing a first-rate manufacturing operation and highly efficient logistics, CST sets the standard for excellence in the tire industry. At CST, quality, integrity and service are more than just words: They’re the foundation of the company from top management to the factory floor and beyond.

cstCMS3N.name: CST CM-S3N
cstCMS3N.shortDescription: CST S-3N- বেস্ট গ্রিপিং, ব্রেকিং,  করনারিং এন্ড রাইডিং কমফোর্টনেস এর জন্য সেরা একটি  টায়ার

products.name: Maxxis Extramaxx
products.shortDescription: Maxxis Extramax বায়াস টেকনোলজি সফট  কম্পাউন্ড টায়ার, টায়ারটি গ্রিপিং, কর্নারিং, রাইডিং কম্ফোর্টনেস এন্ড ব্রেকিং এর জন্য সেরা একটি টায়ার।
products.offer: তিন সেট টায়ার কিনলে পাবেন ১৫০০ টাকা ক্যাশ ব্যাক
products.companyDetails: MAXXIS is a Taiwanese vehicle tire brand and manufacturer that makes a wide variety of motorized and non-motorized vehicle tires, especially for passenger cars, SUVs, ATVs, commercial vehicles, motorcycles as well as bicycles. Beholding under the mother company Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co. Ltd. (Cheng Shin Tire), the brand is a globally known and reputed tire manufacturer in the world. Accordingly, the mother organization also holds another tire brand CST which is the largest bicycle tire manufacturer in the world.

products.shortDescription: Maxxis Dual Purpose টায়ার — অল সিজন, রোদ-বৃষ্টি ও কাঁদামাটিতে রাইডিং এর জন্য সেরা একটি টায়ার। বায়াস টেকনোলজিতে তৈরি এই টায়ারটি লং-লাস্টিং এন্ড স্টাবিলিটি এর জন্য খুবই ভালো।
products.companyDetails: Great companies start small while crafting a grand vision for the future. Maxxis too had a humble beginning in 1967, manufacturing bicycle tyres in Taiwan in the name of Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co. Ltd. We soon became the largest manufacturers of bicycle tyres in the world. Today, as the world’s 9th largest and most trusted tyre brand, Maxxis delivers cutting edge tyre products, across categories to over 180 countries. Over the past five decades Maxxis has spread its tread marks into new markets offering products for motorcycles, ATVs, lawn & amp, garden products, race karts, industrial vehicles, trailers, autos, light trucks, trucks and buses. With new factories and distribution facilities, we have spread our operations to Taiwan, China, Thailand, Vietnam, USA, Canada, Great Britain, Germany, Holland, Japan, Dubai, and more recently, India and Indonesia. As we gallop ahead to the future, Maxxis continues to uphold the values of integrity and quality at its core. Our products, touted as one of the world’s best, go through stringent quality controls and tests at the world’s leading tyre centres. We use the most advanced equipments for manufacturing, and the most committed resource – our people, to bring the very best to the customer. Our tyres make every journey worth a ride.
